alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 5:51AM CDT until May 07 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Jenks affecting Tulsa County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Jenks. * WHEN...From early this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs, primarily west of Jenks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 17.2 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
